name: Chana Masala
description: Made with chickpeas, onion, tomatoe, and an array of aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Made by heating oil or ghee in a separate pan and then adding spices such as cumin, mustard seeds, and red chili powder.

name: Aloo Dum
description: Consists of boiled or fried potatoes cooked in a spiced tomato-based sauce, combined with a mixture of onion, tomato, ginger, and garlic.

name: Aloo Matar
description: Consists of fried potatoes and green peas cooked in a spiced tomato-based sauce, which then flavored with aromatic spices.

name: Mix Veg
description: Consists of a variety of vegetables cooked together in a spiced tomato-based sauce.

name: Matar Paneer
description: Consists of green peas and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spiced tomato-based sauce.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Consists of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Chilli Paneer
description: Consists of deep-fried paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cubes that are cooked in a spicy, sweet, and tangy sauce.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Consists of chicken cooked in a spiced sauce, made by frying onion, tomato, ginger, and garlic in oil or ghee.

name: Chicken Kosha
description: The chicken is typically marinated with yogurt, ginger, garlic, and a blend of spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala.

name: Chicken Butter Masala
description: Consists of tender pieces of chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Chilli Chicken
description: Made with vegetables such as capsicum, onion, and carrot, has more sauce, which is thicker.

name: Egg Curry
description: Made with boiled eggs that are simmered in a rich and spicy tomato-based sauce.

name: Egg Tadka
description: Dish made with boiled eggs are mixed with tadka dal along with tomatoes, and garlic.

name: Fish Curry
description: Consists of fish pieces cooked in a spicy and flavorful sauce made with onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and a blend of spices.

name: Mutton Curry
description: Made with tender chunks of mutton cooked in a flavorful and aromatic sauce consisting of onions, garlic, ginger, and tomatoes, which are saut√©ed in oil and spices and garam masala.

name: Veg Thali
description: An exquisite thali consisting of Rice, 2 Roti, Dal Tadka, Papad, Aloo Bhujia, Mix Veg.

name: Chicken Thali
description: An exquisite thali consisting of Rice, 2 Roti, Dal Tadka, Papad, Aloo Bhujia, Chicken Curry.

name: Egg Thali
description: An exquisite thali consisting of Rice, 2 Roti, Dal Tadka, Papad, Aloo Bhujia, Egg Curry.

name: Fish Thali
description: An exquisite thali consisting of Rice, 2 Roti, Dal Tadka, Papad, Aloo Bhujia, Fish Curry.

name: Mutton Thali
description: An exquisite thali consisting of Rice, 2 Roti, Dal Tadka, Papad, Aloo Bhujia, Mutton Curry.

name: Aloo Biryani
description: Aloo Biryani is a fragrant Indian rice dish made with spiced potatoes, basmati rice, and aromatic spices. Served with raita.

name: Egg Biryani
description: Egg Biryani is a fragrant Indian rice dish made with basmati rice and aromatic spices. Served with raita.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Chicken Biryani is a fragrant Indian rice dish made with spiced chicken, basmati rice, and aromatic spices. Served with raita and 1 egg.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: Mutton Biryani is a fragrant Indian rice dish made with spiced mutton, basmati rice, and aromatic spices. Served with raita and 1 egg.

name: Luchi
description: Simple Luchi

name: Paratha
description: Simple Paratha

name: Tawa Roti
description: Simple Tawa Roti

name: Rumali Roti
description: Simple Rumali Roti

name: Boiled Rice
description: Simple Boiled Rice
